List resources for a package

Source: R/list_package_resources.R
list_package_resources.Rd

List resources for a package on the portal.

Usage

list_package_resources(package)

Arguments

package

A way to identify the package. Either a package ID (passed as a character vector directly), a single package resulting from list_packages or search_packages, or the package's URL from the portal.

Value

A tibble of resources along with metadata, including name, id, format (the format of the resource file), and last_modified (the date the resource was last modified).

Examples

# \donttest{
list_package_resources("1db34737-ffad-489d-a590-9171d500d453")
#> # A tibble: 13 × 4
#>    name                                id                   format last_modified
#>    <chr>                               <chr>                <chr>  <date>       
#>  1 Transit shelter data                b9214fd7-60d1-45f3-… GeoJS… 2022-11-28   
#>  2 Transit shelter data - 4326.gpkg    067a6003-f5d6-41d2-… gpkg   2025-03-27   
#>  3 Transit shelter data - 2945.gpkg    b8f29291-0027-494c-… GPKG   2022-04-22   
#>  4 Transit shelter data - 4326.csv     ecf41899-aed0-405e-… CSV    2025-03-27   
#>  5 Transit shelter data - 2945.csv     5a1bc1c9-7784-4392-… CSV    2022-04-22   
#>  6 Transit shelter data - 4326.geojson e4bdd549-dc39-4a3e-… GeoJS… 2025-03-27   
#>  7 Transit shelter data - 2945.geojson ccbb8cbc-811a-4276-… GeoJS… 2022-04-22   
#>  8 Transit shelter data - 4326.zip     2d0b0f40-b86a-42b2-… SHP    2025-03-27   
#>  9 Transit shelter data - 2945.zip     f6778e95-0cf4-494d-… SHP    2022-04-22   
#> 10 Transit shelter data - 2952.gpkg    15261fdf-8cc1-4065-… gpkg   2025-03-27   
#> 11 Transit shelter data - 2952.geojson fa0d875c-53c2-4715-… GeoJS… 2025-01-01   
#> 12 Transit shelter data - 2952.csv     fbdf81d6-8f40-4781-… CSV    2025-03-27   
#> 13 Transit shelter data - 2952.zip     757fb910-dbf7-4148-… SHP    2025-03-27   
list_package_resources("https://open.toronto.ca/dataset/ttc-subway-delay-data")
#> # A tibble: 15 × 4
#>    name                                  id                 format last_modified
#>    <chr>                                 <chr>              <chr>  <date>       
#>  1 ttc-subway-delay-codes                3900e649-f31e-4b7… XLSX   2022-04-06   
#>  2 ttc-subway-delay-data-readme          ca43ac3d-3940-431… XLSX   2022-04-06   
#>  3 ttc-subway-delay-jan-2014-april-2017  8ca4a6ed-5e7e-4b9… XLSX   2022-04-06   
#>  4 ttc-subway-delay-may-december-2017    e2ee9f63-3130-4d6… XLSX   2022-04-06   
#>  5 ttc-subway-delay-data-2018            32bd0973-e83d-4df… XLSX   2022-04-06   
#>  6 ttc-subway-delay-data-2019            1df6aace-fa16-40e… XLSX   2022-04-06   
#>  7 ttc-subway-delay-data-2020            1ba66ead-cddf-453… XLSX   2022-04-06   
#>  8 ttc-subway-delay-data-2021            c6e4f5eb-6ed7-4db… XLSX   2022-04-06   
#>  9 ttc-subway-delay-data-2022            441143ca-8194-44c… XLSX   2023-01-23   
#> 10 ttc-subway-delay-data-2023            2fbec48b-33d9-489… XLSX   2024-01-18   
#> 11 ttc-subway-delay-data-2024            2ee1a65c-da06-4ad… XLSX   2025-01-21   
#> 12 TTC Subway Delay Data since 2025      6088e14f-e46e-4f5… XLSX   NA
